title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin doubles down on his stance that Browns QB Deshaun Watson should be suspended for the entire season after another report surfaces alleging more potential victims than initially believed. He criticizes Jayson Tatum of the Celtics for backing away from the "super star" label as he battles the Warriors in the Finals. He also tells you why Brett Favre had a better career than Aaron Rodgers. Plus, Nick Wright from First Things First joins the show to explain to Colin why Draymond Green is on the verge of tarnishing his legacy as an all time great player.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Colin doubles down on his stance that Browns QB Deshaun Watson should be suspended for the entire season after another report surfaces alleging more potential victims than initially believed. He criticizes Jayson Tatum of the Celtics for backing away from the "super star" label as he battles the Warriors in the Finals. He also tells you why Brett Favre had a better career than Aaron Rodgers. Plus, Nick Wright from First Things First joins the show to explain to Colin why Draymond Green is on the verge of tarnishing his legacy as an all time great player.
